title: Richard Bona - Discography (1999-2008) [mp3@160-320]
description:
Richard Bona is a jazz musician and bassist, was born in October 28, 1967 in the town of Minta, in eastern Cameroon.
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Bona" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Bona</a>


Torrent includes:

Scenes From My Life (1999) 
North Sea Jazz Festival (2000) 
Reverence (2001) 
Munia (The Tale) (2003) 
Live In Paris (2004)
Toto Bona Lokua (2004)
Tiki (2005) 
Bona Makes You Sweat (2008)


Larry Coryell - Spaces Revisited  (1997) (Richard Bona - Bass) 
Jonathan Elias - The Prayer Cycle (1999) (Richard Bona - Vocal)(128kbps)
Mike Stern - Who Let The Cats Out (2006) (Richard Bona - Bass, Vocal)
Mo Bop - New Electric Trio I. II & III (Richard Bona - Electric Fretted and Fretless Bass)
Sadao Watanabe & Richard Bona - Live - One For You (2006) 
Pat Metheny Group - The Way Up (2005) (Richard Bona - Guitar, Percussion, Voices)
Pat Metheny Group - Speaking Of Now (2002) (Rachard Bona - Guitar (Acoustic), Percussion, Vocals, Fretless Bass)
